    Class
    Description

    Represents a game event indicating that the Jeopardy game has finished.

    Represents a game event indicating that a new Jeopardy game has started.

    Represents a game event indicating that a question file has been successfully loaded.

    Represents a game event indicating that a player has joined the game.

    Represents a game event indicating that a player has answered a question.

    Represents a game event indicating that a player has selected a category.
    class 
    SelectPlayerCountEvent
    Represents a game event indicating that the player count has been selected.
    class 
    SelectQuestionEvent
    Represents a game event indicating that a player has selected a question (by category and value).
    class 
    StartGameEvent
    Represents an event indicating the start of a new game.
